name: ARM & HAMMER Simply Saline Nighttime Drug-Free Mist for Nasal Congestion at Night, Extra Strength, Calming Eucalyptus, Safe to Use with Rx and OTC, For Adults and Kids Ages 2+, 4.6 oz (129 g)
short_description: 4.6 oz (129g) ARM & HAMMER Simply Saline Nighttime Nasal Mist; instant relief for nighttime nasal congestion; helps you breathe easier, sleep better
This extra-strength nasal spray is drug-free, steroid-free, non-habit forming, and safe to use day and night, with prescription and OTC medications
It helps soothe, moisturize, and relieve severe congestion; helps relieve runny noses and flushes out dust, dirt, pollen in nasal and sinus passages
Instant relief for nighttime nose congestion in a nasal spray for adults and kids ages 2+; Simply Saline Nighttime is safe to use as often as needed
To use, expel a short stream of mist into the air until ready then coat nasal passages or use to flush and irrigate sinuses (see package directions)
This nasal spray has no steroids; made with safe, gentle ingredients such as purified water, salt, eucalyptus, menthol and ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda
ARM & HAMMER Simply Saline is proud to be the number-one non-medicated saline nasal spray brand in the U.S.(1) and a trusted ARM & HAMMER product
product_description: Put nighttime nasal congestion to rest with drug-free ARM & HAMMER Simply Saline Nighttime Nasal Mist. An extra-strength formula with calming eucalyptus, it helps soothe, moisturize, and relieve severe nasal congestion at night. It starts working in seconds to help you get better sleep as it helps with sinus pressure, nasal blockage and helps you breathe easier. Its comforting mist helps relieve runny noses and flushes out dust, dirt, pollen and congestion from nasal and sinus passages. Use as often as needed as this non-habit forming, drug-free saline nasal spray can be used with prescriptions and OTC medications. It’s steroid-free and made with safe ingredients including purified water, salt, eucalyptus, menthol and ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda. Before first use, expel a short stream of mist into the air, then the nozzle tip is ready to coat nasal passages or flush and irrigate sinuses (see package directions).

product_description: Little Remedies Saline Nasal Spray and Drops provide relief from stuffy noses and are the number one pediatrician-recommended children’s nasal spray brand.* This baby saline nasal spray and drops temporarily relieve stuffy, dry, or crusty noses and keep your baby's nose clear and moisturized. This nose spray flushes mucus from little ones’ noses, providing a nasal rinse that can be used as a dropper or as a soft spray to help your baby breathe easier. Little Remedies Nasal Saline Spray and Drops contain no alcohol and are drug-free and preservative-free. This non-medicated saline spray can help with your kid’s cold and allergy symptoms and can even be used as saline nose drops for newborns. This baby saline nasal spray and nasal drops can be used as often as needed without the worry of any harmful side effects or drug interactions. As a parent, it's the little things that matter. Your baby's little giggles, little steps, and little sniffles. Being there with a little hug and a little song. Loving touches and attention to detail go into everything you do. Little things matter to us, too. Little Remedies designs safe and reliable solutions just for babies. To help your baby stay happy, we make sure they have everything they need and nothing they don't. *IQVIA, using the ProVoice Survey, from December 1, 2022 to November 30, 2023. Little Remedies, Saline Nasal Spray, Newborn Nose Drops are both FSA-eligible and HSA-eligible in the U.S.

product_description: Revitalize your sinus health with Mucinex Sinus Saline Nasal Spray – a fast, drug-free solution for sinus congestion relief. This non-medicated, non-drowsy formula helps you breathe easier without unwanted side effects. Made with just two simple ingredients—purified water and sodium chloride—Mucinex Sinus Spray is free from preservatives like benzalkonium chloride and phenylcarbinol. Featuring a dual-action nozzle, it offers both a powerful jet spray and a gentle fine mist to target tough congestion from colds and everyday dryness caused by allergens. Mucinex Saline Spray moisturizes and soothes nasal passages and is safe for adults and children 2 years and older.* *Gentle mist nozzle only. Power jet mist is safe for ages 6+.

short_description: GENTLE, NON-MEDICATED CONGESTION RELIEF: The Frida Baby Saline Mist Spray provides safe, drug-free relief for baby congestion by effectively loosening thick, stubborn boogers and moisturizing dry nasal passages. It’s ideal for babies suffering from allergies, colds, or dry environments.

2-IN-1 VERSATILE APPLICATION FOR ALL AGES: Designed with a unique applicator, the spray can be used upright as a fine mist or upside down as a gentle dropper, making it easy to administer saline to tiny, sensitive noses. The small, ergonomic tip is specially crafted for newborns and infants.

CLEAN, NATURAL FORMULA FOR PEACE OF MIND: Made from just salt and water, this saline spray contains no alcohol, medication, or artificial additives, ensuring it’s gentle enough for everyday use on the most sensitive skin and nasal tissues.

PREPARES FOR EFFECTIVE ASPIRATION: Use the saline spray as a pre-treatment before using the NoseFrida Nasal Aspirator. The mist softens mucus and preps the nasal passages, making snot removal quicker and more effective for both parent and baby.
TRUSTED BY PARENTS & PEDIATRICIANS: Frida Baby’s commitment to safe, effective, and parent-friendly solutions makes this saline spray an essential addition to your baby health and wellness kit.

name: Xlear Natural Saline Nasal Spray with Xylitol, Nose Moisturizer for Kids and Adults, 0.75 fl oz (Pack of 1)
short_description: NATURAL SALINE SOLUTION & NASAL RINSE: Our nasal saline spray will gently clean and moisturize the sinus tissues. Unlike other normal saline nasal sprays our spray can also decongest the sinuses by targeting the primary causes of nasal congestion. Our nose spray will help reduce tissue swelling from pollen, pollution, contaminants, and other irritants.

SAFE NASAL RINSE & SPRAY: Our all-natural nasal cleaner is safe for kids, non-addictive, Non-GMO Project Verified and is effective without the use of steroids, drugs, or chemicals. It is the ideal daily sinus medicine that will reduce swelling and open your airways. Using our saline nose spray before bed may reduce snoring.

IMPROVED FORMULA WITH XYLITOL: Our patented saline nasal spray solution may reduce tissue inflammation and naturally open airways. Xylitol's powerful oral and upper respiratory health benefits come from its unique five-carbon structure. Xylitol may help reduce swelling and allergy symptoms by reducing contaminant adhesion on your nasal tissue.

EASY TO USE DIRECTIONS: Clear the nasal passageway by gently blowing your nose before using Xlear. Prime the pump by holding the sinus rinse bottle upright and pumping one or more times until the saline solution is dispensed. Insert nozzle into nostril and depress pump completely while breathing in through your nose. Spray each nostril 2-4 times and use at least twice daily.

WASH AWAY POLLUTANTS: Our natural saline nasal spray can wash away pollutants and help to bring sinus relief. Use our sinus spray daily to protect and keep your nasal passages clean. Each 1.5 oz bottle delivers approx. 240 fine mist Sprays so you can find fast and quick relief.
